text: Craig McLean (born 25 October 1998) is a British swimmer. ==Career== McLean won silver in the boys' 100m freestyle at the 2015 Commonwealth Youth Games. As a senior, he represented Scotland at the 2018 Commonwealth Games in Gold Coast, where he won a bronze medal in the men's 4 × 100 metre freestyle relay. At the 2018 European Championships, McLean was part of the British team that won bronze in the mixed 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay, a new event at the game. ==References== ==External links== *Craig McLean at British Swimming Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:British male swimmers Category:People from Livingston, West Lothian Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in swimming Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Scotland Category:Male freestyle swimmers Category:European Aquatics Championships medalists in swimming Category:Swimmers at the 2018 Commonwealth Games
title: Craig McLean
